title: [Epidemiology] Hospital outbreak of COVID-19 in 14 patients and 38 employees linked back to 1 patient who initially tested negative

[Epidemiology] This large statewide serologic study estimated that 2.4% of adults in Virginia had exposure to SARS-CoV-2, which was 2.8-fold higher than confirmed case counts. Most infections were asymptomatic. As of August 2020, the population in Virginia remained largely immunologically naive to the virus.
